title: Add Wake-On-Lan
author: JRVcr
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.

<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
Please add a Wake-On-LAN option so I can wake up remote workstations that are asleep to allow RDP-ing into them. In Windows computers sleep after an idle pe...

comments.snippet:
Hey, i just added WOL function using this (on Windows):

- https://github.com/AlexGhiondea/wol
- ConEmu

config looks like the following:

can be called from a connection and produces the following output:
